roleset.name: be very good (at), extremely skilled at
roleset.note: EXCEL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'excel' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry succeed-74-1 (from excel.01-v predicate notes)
EXCELLENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on 'good.02' (from excellent.02-j)

example.name: pied-piping
example.text: From my own point of view, given the qualities of humanity, creativity and warm spirit in which the Cuban people excel [*T*-2], we deny ourselves access to things we hold dear, and which seem to run in such short supply these days.
example.arg: in which -> the qualities of humanity, creativity and warm spirit

example.name: both args
example.text: The waiter was excellent at taking us through the local menu.
example.arg: at taking us through the local menu

roleset.name: generally superb
roleset.note: EXCELLENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, good.01. (from excellent.01-j)

role.descr: target, entity excellent behavior is directed at

example.name: both args
example.text: But all in all I had a great time, got a great amp, and everyone at Matamp was really excellent to me.

roleset.name: extremely beneficial, healthful
roleset.note: EXCELLENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on 'good.04'. (from excellent.03-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: Tangerine Oil Is Excellent For You.
